info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 5:17PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Rawlins and western Decatur Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 516 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Herndon, or 14 miles northeast of Atwood, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Herndon around 520 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Oberlin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
